column1: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
Rationale: Increasing the configuration of my services to indeed improve performance,
- Change EC2 Instance Pricing strategy to On-Demand, upgrade instance type to c4.8xlarge
- Change RDS for MYSql pPricing strategy to On-Demand, upgrade instance type to db.r6g.8xlarge
